ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when the Garden is brought up close:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when Paradise is brought near.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when Paradise is brought near.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when the garden is brought nigh,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when Paradise shall be brought nigh,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when the Garden is brought nigh,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when the Garden shall be brought nigh,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And when the Garden is brought near;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when Paradise shall be brought near,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when Paradise is brought near,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [81:13] and when Paradise is brought near, [when it is] brought close to those who have merited it, that they may enter it (the response to idhā, ‘when’, at the beginning of the sūra and all that has been supplemented thereto is [the following]):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when the Garden is brought nigh) for the believers
